parameters.name: profile
parameters.label: Configuration profile(s)
parameters.usage: Configuration profile to use. Can use multiple (comma separated).

parameters.name: params-file
parameters.label: Parameter options
parameters.usage: Set the parameters of the pipeline using a JSON file configuration filei (i.e. 'params.json'). All parameters defined as JSON type must be this way. For example, the JSON can contain: "alphaFoldOptions": "--max_template=2024-01-01 --multimer". WARNING: passing the option '--alphaFoldOptions' in command line will throw an error when the option contains '-' or '--' characters which are not appreciated by nextflow.

parameters.name: fastaPath
parameters.label: Input fasta directory
parameters.usage: Path to the input directory which contains the fasta files.

parameters.name: genomeAnnotationPath
parameters.label: Annotation path
parameters.usage: Path to genome/proteome annotations folder used to predict the protein 3D structure.

parameters.name: proteinLigandFile
parameters.label: Input file
parameters.usage: Path to the input file for molecular docking. The file must be in CSV format, without space. One column named 'protein' contains the path the the 'pdb' file and one column named 'ligand' must contain the path to the 'sdf' file.

parameters.name: alphaFoldDatabase
parameters.label: alphaFold database
parameters.usage: Path to the database required by AlphaFold.

parameters.name: alphaFoldHelp
parameters.label: alphaFold help
parameters.usage: Display all the options available to run AlphaFold. Use this option in combination with -profile singularity.

parameters.name: alphaFoldOptions
parameters.label: alphaFold options
parameters.usage: Prediction model options passed to AlphaFold or MassiveFold.

parameters.name: launchAlphaFold
parameters.label: launch alphaFold
parameters.usage: Launch AlphaFold.

parameters.name: colabFoldDatabase
parameters.label: colabFold database
parameters.usage: Path to the database required by ColabFold.

parameters.name: colabFoldHelp
parameters.label: colabFold help
parameters.usage: Display all the options available to run ColabFold. Use this option in combination with -profile singularity.

parameters.name: colabFoldOptions
parameters.label: colabFold options
parameters.usage: Prediction model options passed to ColabFold.

parameters.name: launchColabFold
parameters.label: launch colabFold
parameters.usage: Launch ColabFold.

parameters.name: dynamicBindDatabase
parameters.label: dynamicBind database
parameters.usage: Path to the database required by DynamicBind.

parameters.name: dynamicBindHelp
parameters.label: dynamicBind help
parameters.usage: Display all the options available to run DynamicBind. Use this option in combination with -profile singularity.

parameters.name: dynamicBindOptions
parameters.label: dynamicBind options
parameters.usage: Prediction model options passed to DynamicBind.

parameters.name: launchDynamicBind
parameters.label: launch DynamicBind
parameters.usage: Launch DynamicBind.

parameters.name: massiveFoldDatabase
parameters.label: massiveFold database
parameters.usage: Path to the database required by MassiveFold.

parameters.name: massiveFoldHelp
parameters.label: massivebFold help
parameters.usage: Display all the options available to run MassiveFold. Use this option in combination with -profile singularity.

parameters.name: massiveFoldOptions
parameters.label: massiveFold options
parameters.usage: Specific options for MassiveFold. As MassiveFold is an AlphaFold-like tool, standard AlphaFold options are passed using the --alphaFoldOptions option.

parameters.name: launchMassiveFold
parameters.label: launch massiveFold
parameters.usage: Launch MassiveFold.

parameters.name: fromMsas
parameters.label: from msas
parameters.usage: Path to existing multiple sequence alignments (msas) to use for the 3D protein strcuture prediction. Typically the path could be the results of the pipeline launcded with the --onlyMsas option.

parameters.name: onlyMsas
parameters.label: only msas
parameters.usage: When true, the pipeline will only generate the multiple sequence alignments (msas).

parameters.name: outDir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: The output directory where the results will be saved

parameters.name: useGpu
parameters.label: useGpu
parameters.usage: Run the prediction model on GPU. While AlphaFold and MassiveFold can run on CPU, ColabFold requires GPU only.
